channel.title: Earth Engine on 東京の資産運用会社で働く社会人が研究に没頭するブログ
channel.description: Recent content in Earth Engine on 東京の資産運用会社で働く社会人が研究に没頭するブログ

item.title: （執筆中）【日次GDP】Earth Engineの衛星写真を使って景況感をナウキャスティングしてみる
item.description: library(Rnightlights) library(lubridate) library(reshape2) #(Optional performance enhancement if you have aria2c and gdal installed) #pkgOptions(downloadMethod = "aria", cropMaskMethod = "gdal", extractMethod = "gdal", deleteTiles = TRUE) #Optional performance enhancement. If extractMethod="rast" you can specify the number of #CPU cores to use in parallel #pkgOptions(extractMethod = "rast", numCores=4) ctry <- "USA" #replace to run for any other country #download and process monthly VIIRS stats at the highest admin level highestAdmLevelStats <- getCtryNlData(ctryCode = ctry, admLevel = "highest", nlType = "VIIRS.
